details: KB landing page refreshed with onboarding structure
KB landing page refreshed with mission, vision, and contributor pathways
KB directory relocated inside website
Fixed broken links in KB index after directory relocation
Next.js website build successful after KB relocation
Added contributor growth roadmap with visual pathways
Created interactive quickstart with copy-paste commands
Enhanced with live metrics integration and project health indicators
Added community showcase highlighting contributor stories and achievements
Updated with links to new pathways, quickstart, and showcase pages
Next.js website build successful after adding new KB pages (pathways, quickstart, showcase, metrics)
KB directory relocated and landing page updated
KB landing page validated with mission, vision, values, and all required links
Directory hygiene confirmed - all KB content in /website/kb/, no old /wp-kb/ directories found
Next.js build successful - all KB pages compiled (11/11 routes generated including /kb paths)
Build artifacts ready for deployment to Vercel/Netlify - KB content accessible at /kb routes
CI/CD pipeline configured for build + deploy
Workflow syntax validated, build step tested successfully, ready for deployment
Mission, vision, values, and KB links added to NeuroSwarm landing page
Landing page published live with mission-driven content
GitHub Actions deployment workflow triggered by push to main branch
NeuroSwarm website successfully deployed to https://getblockchain.tech/neuroswarm/ with mission-driven landing page and full KB integration
Resolved all ESLint issues (27 problems  0) for clean CI/CD pipeline
GitHub Actions deployment triggered with linting fixes for clean production build
Migrated CI/CD pipeline to pnpm with frozen lockfile for reliable dependency management
Generated pnpm lock file for consistent dependency resolution in CI/CD
GitHub Actions deployment triggered with pnpm migration for lock file resolution
Migrated entire CI workflow from npm to pnpm - updated setup-node cache, added pnpm setup, changed all npm commands to pnpm with frozen-lockfile, added working-directory for website context
Replaced corepack enable with pnpm/action-setup@v2 action - fixes pnpm executable not found error in GitHub Actions by properly installing pnpm before usage
Updated pnpm version from 8 to 10 in all workflows to match local environment and fix lock file compatibility issues causing frozen-lockfile errors
